channel.title: Please Delete
channel.description:
Closed Due to TOS Violation (I made it using batch).
Please Look for my new Program that will be made using a real program maker (Most Likely Game Maker Pro).

item.title: Please Delete
item.dc:creator: @Hackerz Hackerz
item.description:
@Hackerz wrote:

Can you try some other color, and try a different Item please.

The Whip I had to guess the original color due to my Item list didn’t tell me, so I may not have been right!

Ya It is the Origional color, it is set to 933 instead of 528 like it should be! I have it fixed, I will re-upload it in a second![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 16, 2009, 08:52:03 pm[/size][hr]ok here if the fix that way I don’t have to reupload (Do this if you want)

In the folder were main.bat is located, open the folder main, then the folder weapon.

The right click and edit the file awhip.bat

look for this :
echo.class8.anIntArray156[0] = 933; >>awhip.txt
replace it with this:
echo.class8.anIntArray156[0] = 528; >>awhip.txt

Then it will work right!

Tested and is working, I now have a blue red and green whip!

Read full topic
